alert.note: Alert for Big Island East; Big Island North; Big Island Southeast; Kohala; Kona (Hawaii) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Wind Advisory issued December 13 at 9:05PM HST until December 15 at 6:00AM HST by NWS Honolulu
info.description: ...WIND ADVISORY NOW IN EFFECT FOR ALL HAWAIIAN ISLANDS... .A cold front will move southeast through Maui County and into the Big Island tonight, then push south of the Big Island Thursday morning. Strong winds will behind the front will be particularly gusty over and downwind of mountains and through valleys. ...WIND ADVISORY IN EFFECT UNTIL 6 AM HST FRIDAY... * WHAT...North to northeast winds increasing to 20 to 30 mph with localized gusts over 50 mph. * WHERE...Big Island. * WHEN...Until 6 AM HST Friday. * IMPACTS...Winds this strong can knock down holiday decorations and tree branches and blow around unsecured objects. Strong gusts can make it difficult to drive, especially for high profile vehicles.
info.instruction: Watch out for falling tree branches when walking or driving. Make sure tents and awnings are secure or take them down. Be prepared for power outages.

area.areaDesc: Big Island East; Big Island North; Big Island Southeast; Kohala; Kona
